skillTree.name: Ghostly Howl
skillTree.description: The wails of a Banshee can be lethal and strike terror into the hearts of any who hear them.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Ghostly Camaraderie
skillTree.description: Together, swift flashes of iridescent light strike fourth and tear the enemy apart.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

skillTree.name: Chilling Aura
skillTree.description: Did you feel that? It's as if the Winds themselves protest...

skillTree.name: Wail of Grief
skillTree.description: Their screams ring out for miles and sap the will of those unfortunate enough to be within earshot.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -2
	(local enemy armies)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -4
	(local enemy armies)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Neverending Remorse
skillTree.description: The memories of their sorcerous crimes in life drive them through a horrible existence in between realms.

effects.description:
Cooldown: +2% to all spells
	(local enemy armies)

Cooldown: +4% to all spells
	(local enemy armies)

Cooldown: +8% to all spells
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Bony Visage
skillTree.description: The abject terror felt in the presence of a banshee saps the enemy's very essence.

skillTree.name: Greater Tomb Scream
skillTree.description: Ringing ears, blurred vision - the end approaches...

skillTree.name: Swirling Winds
skillTree.description: Offensive winds seem to bend around this figure. Oddly enough, the enemy's legs feel similarly.

effects.description:
Speed: -1% for all units
	(local enemy armies)

Speed: -3% for all units
	(local enemy armies)

Speed: -5% for all units
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Bending Reed
skillTree.description: The ancient spirit moves with the swiftness needed to avoid the retribution of afterlife, striking fear into those who'd balk her speed.

skillTree.name: Piercing Lament
skillTree.description: The last thing they will hear is the keening of her tortured soul.

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -2% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)
